archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Prepare/Follow-up for Performance Reviews
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Undertake any preparatory and/or follow-up steps with other processes/entities in conjunction with performance reviews Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Not used for this process element Mandatory Undertake any preparatory and/or follow-up steps with other processes/entities in conjunction with performance reviews
